name: Coast
headline: Solution Gateway for API-First Companies
description:
Coast transforms APIs into business value. Product-led teams use Coast to build interactive user journeys powered by one or multiple APIs, creating fully functional web apps with live API connectivity.

Our visual platform makes APIs more accessible and accelerates commercialization, enabling high-impact digital transformation for the world’s largest enterprises.
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:sales-enablement; industry:api; location:new-york
generated_description:
Coast is a dynamic startup launched in 2022, hailing from Y Combinator's Batch S21 and based in New York City. With a lean team of 14, Coast serves as a crucial solution provider for API-first companies, focusing on transforming APIs into direct business value. Their mission? To empower product-led teams to craft interactive user journeys that harness the full potential of their APIs.

Imagine selling more than just documentation—imagine providing a live demonstration of what an API can accomplish. That’s what Coast does. They equip companies with a visually appealing platform that simplifies the process of commercializing APIs, driving meaningful digital transformation for some of the largest enterprises globally.

The company's unique approach allows users to generate customized, interactive demos without needing extensive coding knowledge. Think of it as giving every prospect a test drive—a bespoke demo that showcases exactly how an API can work for their specific needs. Coast’s no-code admin dashboard and instant link generation features mean sales teams can focus on building relationships rather than getting bogged down in technical setups.

Coast's features empower businesses to stand out in their outreach, collapse sales cycles, and enhance activation times, all while bringing clarity to complex API integrations. Their platform turns mundane cURL requests into dynamic UIs and offers embedded analytics to gauge prospect engagement in real-time, making Coast not just a tool but a crucial asset in the sales toolkit.

The buzz is already palpable, with endorsements from happy customers like Martine Katz at Unit and Calvin French-Owen from Segment. They both emphasize how Coast's personalized demos significantly cut down the time needed to convey product value to customers, which is a game changer for API-centric sales.

Coast is positioned under tags like 'SaaS', 'B2B', and 'sales enablement', indicating their commitment to enhancing the sales experience in the digital realm. Whether you’re aiming to engage potential clients or streamline your sales pipeline, Coast serves as a robust ally in making API engagement beautiful and effective.

For more information or to see Coast in action, you can visit their website at [trycoast.com](https://trycoast.com).
